name: Inn The Dark
description:
STORY
You have been sent to a Dark Hotel to investigate the triple Homicide of a father, mother and daughter. These who ran the Dark Hotel. Inn doing so you will uncover the deep dark secrets of not only the Hotel or it's owners but yourself.

GAMEPLAY
Inn The Dark is a first person survival horror game where you must investigate the strange super natural on goings in a haunted hotel after being sent there to investigate a triple homicide. Find Notes that tell the story of the Dark Hotel and uncover the truth about not only the homicide or the hotel but yourself.

But beware! Something isn't right here. Something hides Inn the dark and it is deadly. They will chase you so make sure you don't turn into any dark corners and use cameras to defeat the great evil.

FEATURES
Use everything you find to help you search through the Dark corridors and rooms.


Keep on top of your health and battery life as you run from danger.


Manage your inventory and keep track of your Diary.


Use Polaroid cameras to defeat the ghost who haunts the Hotel.
